emailVerification.verifyEmailDesc: We need to verify your email to access your health report

coverPage.subtitle: Your personalized health journey begins here
coverPage.name: Name

healthOverview.title: Health Overview
healthOverview.topPercentile: You're in the top 15% for your age group
healthOverview.congratsMessage: You're doing great! Your health score shows you're maintaining excellent habits. Keep up the fantastic work!
healthOverview.keepItUpMessage: You're on the right track! With some targeted improvements, you can boost your health score even higher.
healthOverview.needsAttentionMessage: Your health needs attention. Follow the personalized action plan to improve your wellness journey.
healthOverview.tapCategory: Tap any category to view detailed test results

comparativeAnalysis.title: Comparative Analysis
comparativeAnalysis.progressSubtitle: Compared to your results from last year
comparativeAnalysis.topPercentileDesc: Your overall health score places you among the healthiest in your demographic.
comparativeAnalysis.betterCardiovascularDesc: Your heart health metrics are 18% better than your peer average.
comparativeAnalysis.watchVitaminDDesc: Your vitamin D is slightly below the peer average. Consider supplements.
comparativeAnalysis.pastDataNotExist: Past data does not exist. Come back next year to see your progress!
comparativeAnalysis.nextYearComparison: Next year, you'll be able to see your health progress with detailed comparisons, trend analysis, and personalized insights based on your historical data.

riskAssessment.title: Risk Assessment
riskAssessment.basedOnMetrics: Based on your current health metrics
riskAssessment.maintainExerciseDesc: Your active lifestyle is keeping your cardiovascular risk low. Keep up the great work!
riskAssessment.monitorBloodSugarDesc: Given your moderate diabetes risk, regular monitoring will help catch any changes early.
riskAssessment.addMoreFiber: Add more fiber to your diet
riskAssessment.addMoreFiberDesc: Increasing fiber intake can help manage blood sugar levels and reduce diabetes risk.
riskAssessment.younger: years younger than your actual age!
riskAssessment.older: years older than your actual age.
riskAssessment.matchedAge: Your biological age matches your actual age.

smoking.question: Do you currently smoke or have you smoked in the past year?

bpMeds.question: Are you currently taking medication for high blood pressure?

physicalActivity.question: Do you have at least 30 minutes of physical activity daily?

dailyVegetables.question: Do you eat vegetables or fruits every day?

historyHighGlucose.question: Have you ever been found to have high blood glucose (in health examination, during illness, or pregnancy)?

familyHistoryDiabetes.question: Do any members of your family have diabetes?
familyHistoryDiabetes.option2: Yes: grandparent, aunt, uncle or cousin
familyHistoryDiabetes.option4: Yes: both first and second degree relatives

waistCircumference.question: What is your waist circumference in cm? (measured at the level of your belly button)

hasDiabetes.question: Have you been diagnosed with diabetes?

totalCholesterol.question: What is your Total Cholesterol level?

hdlCholesterol.question: What is your HDL (good) Cholesterol level?

systolicBP.question: What is your Systolic Blood Pressure?

phq9_q1.question: Little interest or pleasure in doing things

phq9_q3.question: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

phq9_q4.question: Feeling tired or having little energy

phq9_q6.question: Feeling bad about yourself ‚Äî or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

phq9_q7.question: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

phq9_q8.question: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite ‚Äî being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual

phq9_q9.question: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way

actionPlan.title: Your Action Plan
actionPlan.personalizedRecommendations: Personalized recommendations based on your results
actionPlan.focusOnBloodSugar: Focus on managing your blood sugar levels to reduce diabetes risk
actionPlan.endocrinologistDesc: Your HbA1c levels indicate pre-diabetic range. Consult an endocrinologist for personalized management plan.
actionPlan.glucoseTestDesc: Monitor your blood sugar levels regularly to track progress and adjust lifestyle accordingly.
actionPlan.vitaminDDesc: Your vitamin D levels are below optimal. Retest after supplementation to ensure improvement.
actionPlan.dietDesc: Switch to foods with low glycemic index to manage blood sugar spikes. Include whole grains, legumes, and vegetables.
actionPlan.exerciseDesc: Continue your current exercise routine. Add strength training twice a week for better glucose management.
actionPlan.completeIn3Months: Complete these in the next 3 months for optimal health
actionPlan.AIdisclaimer: The following data is AI generated, kindly consult a doctor as well.
actionPlan.completeAssessmentMessage: To create your personalized action plan, please complete the risk assessment tests on the previous page first.
actionPlan.benefit3: Receive targeted action steps for improvement

support.getInTouch: We're here to help. Get in touch with us through any of the following channels.

cover.subtitle: Welcome to your Employee Health Dashboard - Your gateway to insightful health data of your employees.
cover.overviewDesc: Complete company health metrics & participation analysis
cover.comparisonDesc: Compare with industry benchmarks & track progress
cover.actionPlanDesc: Strategic initiatives to improve employee health

overview.hraParticipationsNeeded: Need {{count}} more HRA participations to unlock
overview.welcomeMessage: Welcome to your Employee Health Dashboard - Your gateway to insightful health data of your employees.
overview.chqDescription: Your company's CHQ is above average, but there's room for improvement. Let's explore.
overview.concernsNote: Note: Highlighted rows indicate less than 20% of the total population have taken related tests, which may impact data representativeness.
overview.winsNote: These are your company's health achievements to be proud of!
overview.hraNeeded: 20% HRA completion needed to unlock this metric
overview.excellentMessage: Outstanding! Your company's health score is at the top tier. Keep up the excellent health initiatives!
overview.goodMessage: Great job! Your company's health is above average. Continue building on this strong foundation.
overview.fairMessage: Your company's health score shows room for improvement. Focus on targeted wellness programs.
overview.needsAttentionMessage: Your company's health needs immediate attention. Implement comprehensive wellness initiatives.

comparison.title: Health Parameter & Risk Comparison
comparison.subtitle: *Note: Comparison data from Corporate Vietnam with similar demographics.
comparison.biologicalAgeInsight: Your employees are aging 2 years slower than industry average - a sign of effective wellness programs!

actionPlan.title: Strategic Wellness Action Plan
actionPlan.subtitle: Evidence-based initiatives tailored to your employees' health profile
actionPlan.targetGroups: Target Groups Based on Health Data
actionPlan.topPriorityDesc: Focus on cardiovascular health - 72% of employees have lipid abnormalities
actionPlan.pathToBetterHealth: Your Path to Better Employee Health
actionPlan.personalizedRecommendations: Strategic initiatives based on employee health data
actionPlan.annualHealthCampDesc: Comprehensive health screening for all employees to detect and prevent health issues early
actionPlan.healthCampOutcome: 90% employee participation with early detection of health risks
actionPlan.specialistVisitDesc: Regular specialist visits to address specific health concerns of high-risk employees
actionPlan.heartHealthDesc: Month-long campaign focusing on cardiovascular health improvement
actionPlan.heartHealthOutcome: 10% reduction in high cholesterol cases within 6 months
actionPlan.cafeteriaMakeoverDesc: Transform workplace cafeteria with healthier Vietnamese food options
actionPlan.cafeteriaOutcome: 15% improvement in lipid profiles within 6 months
actionPlan.nutritionEducationDesc: Regular nutrition education sessions for employees
actionPlan.nutritionEducationOutcome: 80% of employees make healthier food choices
actionPlan.activeWorkplaceDesc: Redesign workplace to encourage physical activity throughout the day
actionPlan.standingDesks: Standing desk options for all employees
actionPlan.activeWorkplaceOutcome: Increase daily movement by 2,000 steps average
actionPlan.wellnessChallengesDesc: Quarterly wellness challenges to maintain engagement
actionPlan.diabetesScreening: Free diabetes screening for all employees
actionPlan.healthyVietnameseCooking: Healthy Vietnamese cooking demo - low sugar pho & banh mi
actionPlan.stressWorkshop: Stress management workshop with local experts
actionPlan.organicFarmVisit: Weekend organic farm visit and fresh market
actionPlan.morningExerciseDesc: Traditional Vietnamese morning exercise before work - proven to boost energy and team spirit
actionPlan.healthyCanteenDesc: Transform your workplace cafeteria with healthier Vietnamese options
actionPlan.teaMeditationDesc: Combine Vietnamese tea culture with mindfulness practices
actionPlan.healthCompetitionsDesc: Fun, competitive wellness activities adapted for Vietnamese workplace culture
actionPlan.noPlanDesc: Click below to generate your first action plan.
